item.description: Syntaxis Titulos # Heading level 1 ## Heading level 2 ### Heading level 3 #### Heading level 4 ##### Heading level 5 ###### Heading level 6 Syntaxis Alternativa Con un solo = o - basta. Heading level 1 =============== Heading level 2 --------------- Mejores practicas Markdown applications donâ€™t agree on how to handle a missing space between the number signs (#) and the heading name. For compatibility, always put a space between the number signs and the heading name.
